summary: PURCHASED VEHICLE NEW IN MAY 2013.   VEHICLE SHAKES VIOLENTLY WHENEVER BRAKING.  ALL 4 ROTORS REPLACED AT 15,900 MILES WITH AFTER MARKET.  HAPPENED AGAIN AT 48,000 MILES AND THE FRONT ROTORS WERE REPLACED WITH AFTERMARKET AGAIN.  HAPPENED AGAIN AT 72,000 MILES AND FRONT ROTORS WERE RESURFACED.  CURRENTLY HAVE 72,300 MILES ON VEHICLE.
